title: Item Sets
body: I can't seem to find the item sets, on the new client. Any help? Or are they not on the new client yet?

replies.body: they are not in the new client. still unsure if they will ever be added.

also if you change your item sets in the legacy client then switch back to the alpha client, the item sets don't update which is infuriating.

You can still access the item sets you made before you updated, but you can't update those item sets with new items and build paths or make new ones for new champions.
